member.name: ID2D1ConcreteTransform.SetCached
member.summary: Sets whether the output of the specified transform is cached.
member.param: TRUE if the output should be cached; otherwise, FALSE.

member.name: ID2D1ConcreteTransform.SetOutputBuffer
member.summary: Sets the properties of the output buffer of the specified transform node.
member.param: The number of bits and the type of the output buffer.
The number of channels in the output buffer (1 or 4).

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: One or more arguments are not valid

member.name: ID2D1ConcreteTransform
member.summary: Represents the set of transforms implemented by the effect-rendering system, which provides fixed-functionality.
